report:
```json
{
  "ux_feedback_report": {
    "summary": {
      "total_issues": 4,
      "priority_distribution": {
        "high": 1,
        "medium": 2,
        "low": 1
      },
      "overall_ux_score": 7.2
    },
    "actionable_feedback": [
      {
        "id": "UX-001",
        "title": "Fix Readability: Increase Font Sizes for Critical Labels",
        "priority": "High",
        "impact_vs_effort": "High Impact / Low Effort",
        "estimated_effort": "1-2 hours",
        "why_it_matters": "Small text (under 12sp) is difficult for many users to read, especially on mobile devices. This impacts accessibility for visually impaired users and makes it harder for all users to parse critical information like prices, social proof (sold counts), and countdown timers.",
        "affected_components": [
          "countdown_timer",
          "product_thumbnail (price/sold labels)",
          "label (On first 3 orders)",
          "security_bar"
        ],
        "implementation_guidance": [
          "Set minimum font size for all secondary labels to 12sp (12dp).",
          "Ensure a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for all text elements.",
          "Use medium or bold weights for dynamic content like countdown digits to improve glanceability.",
          "Standardize the 'X sold' and price comparison styles across all product thumbnails."
        ],
        "wireframe_changes": "Increase the visual scale of text within product cards and timers. Ensure the security bar at the top remains legible but doesn't grow so large it pushes down primary content."
      },
      {
        "id": "UX-002",
        "title": "Improve Feedback: Enhance Cart Timer and Button Interactions",
        "priority": "Medium",
        "impact_vs_effort": "Medium Impact / Low Effort",
        "estimated_effort": "2-3 hours",
        "why_it_matters": "The tiny timer above the cart icon is a 'micro-conversion' driver that is currently too small to notice. Additionally, users need immediate visual confirmation that their tap on 'GET ALL' was successful to prevent frustration and repeat taps.",
        "affected_components": [
          "countdown_timer (above cart icon)",
          "button (GET ALL)"
        ],
        "implementation_guidance": [
          "Enlarge the cart-specific timer and its background container for better visibility.",
          "Add an 'active' state to the 'GET ALL' button (e.g., scale down 5% on press or change background brightness).",
          "Trigger a success toast or a small animation on the cart icon when 'GET ALL' is tapped."
        ],
        "wireframe_changes": "Increase the bounding box for the cart timer. Add a visual indicator (like a ripple or color shift) to button states."
      },
      {
        "id": "UX-003",
        "title": "Visual Hierarchy: Reduce Promotional Clutter",
        "priority": "Medium",
        "impact_vs_effort": "High Impact / Medium Effort",
        "estimated_effort": "4-6 hours",
        "why_it_matters": "The screen currently has 'banner blindness' risk. With too many competing banners and timers, users don't know where to look first. Better whitespace and hierarchy will lead to higher engagement with the primary offer.",
        "affected_components": [
          "promotion_card (Free shipping)",
          "promotion_card (30% off)",
          "section_header (New user gift)"
        ],
        "implementation_guidance": [
          "Increase vertical padding between major sections (e.g., between the top banners and the 'New user gift' section).",
          "Consolidate 'Free shipping' and '30% off' into a single, cohesive hero banner if possible.",
          "Use a distinct background color for the 'New user gift' section to separate it from the general scroll."
        ],
        "wireframe_changes": "Add 16dp-24dp of vertical spacing between different offer types. Create a unified container for top-of-screen promotions."
      },
      {
        "id": "UX-004",
        "title": "Content Design: Add In-place Review Expansion",
        "priority": "Low",
        "impact_vs_effort": "Low Impact / Low Effort",
        "estimated_effort": "1-2 hours",
        "why_it_matters": "Truncated reviews (ending in '...') stop users from getting the full benefit of social proof. Forcing a page transition to read one sentence is high friction.",
        "affected_components": [
          "user_review_card"
        ],
        "implementation_guidance": [
          "Add a 'Read More' text button at the end of truncated reviews.",
          "Implement a simple toggle that expands the card height to show the full text without navigating away.",
          "Limit reviews to 2 lines before truncation."
        ],
        "wireframe_changes": "Add an 'expand' icon or 'Read more' link next to truncated text."
      }
    ],
    "quick_wins": [
      {
        "task": "Font Size Update",
        "description": "Increase all countdown and price labels to 12sp.",
        "impact": "High readability boost with almost zero logic changes."
      },
      {
        "task": "Button Active States",
        "description": "Add native ripple/highlight to 'GET ALL' button.",
        "impact": "Immediate improvement in perceived responsiveness."
      }
    ],
    "priority_order": [
      "UX-001 (Critical Accessibility)",
      "UX-002 (Feedback/Conversion)",
      "UX-003 (Clutter/Hierarchy)",
      "UX-004 (Convenience)"
    ]
  }
}
```
